Welcome.Title: Welcome to DuckovESP v2.8
Welcome.Subtitle: üéâ Major Update: Quest Zone Marking System!
Welcome.FixesDescription: This version introduces quest zone detection and marking system, automatically scanning and displaying all quest zones when level loads:
Welcome.Fix1: ‚úÖ Quest Zone Detection (v2.8 New) - Auto-detect multiple quest types (Reach, Event, Submit Items)
Welcome.Fix2: ‚úÖ Level Load Scan - One-time scan on level load for better performance
Welcome.Fix3: ‚úÖ 3D Circle Markers - Display quest zones as 3D circles and reach ranges on screen
Welcome.Fix4: ‚úÖ Screen-Edge Arrows - Show guiding arrows when quest zones are off-screen
Welcome.Fix5: ‚úÖ Mini-map Markers - Quest zones display as recognizable markers on mini-map
Welcome.Fix6: ‚úÖ TriggerBot Logging Cleaned - Removed redundant auto-trigger logs
Welcome.Fix7: ‚úÖ TaskEvent Support - Improved coordinate extraction for TaskEvent type tasks
Welcome.Fix8: ‚úÖ SpawnPrefabForTask Parsing - Direct location extraction from SpawnPrefabForTask
Welcome.Fix9: ‚úÖ Marker Caching Optimized - Improved quest zone marker caching
Welcome.Fix10: ‚úÖ Performance Optimized - Quest scanning executed only once during level init
Welcome.AboutDescription: DuckovESP is a powerful Duckov game assistance tool with quest zone marking support! Provides ESP transparency, aimbot, triggerbot, and many cheat functions for enhanced gameplay.
Welcome.Feature1: ‚Ä¢ Quest Zone Marking: Auto-detect and display all quest zones (New feature!)
Welcome.Feature2: ‚Ä¢ ESP Transparency: Display enemy, item, and quest item locations and information
Welcome.Feature3: ‚Ä¢ Auto Aim: Intelligent head lock on enemies, automatic target tracking
Welcome.Feature4: ‚Ä¢ Auto Trigger: Automatically fire when target detected, bullet teleportation ignores walls
Welcome.Feature5: ‚Ä¢ Enemy List: Real-time display of all enemies' distance and status
Welcome.Feature6: ‚Ä¢ Cheat Functions: God mode, one-hit kill, speed boost, unlimited resources, etc.
Welcome.Feature7: ‚Ä¢ Configuration System: Customize parameters and hotkeys for all features
Welcome.HotkeyWarning: Note: All hotkeys require holding Shift to work!
Welcome.Tip1: 1. Quest zones are automatically scanned and displayed when level loads
Welcome.Tip2: 2. Quest zones appear as yellow circles in 3D view, with arrows pointing when off-screen
Welcome.Tip3: 3. Quest zones are also marked on mini-map for quick location
Welcome.Tip4: 4. Auto aim and auto trigger must be enabled separately in configuration
Welcome.Tip5: 5. Auto trigger automatically disables in base for safety
Welcome.Tip6: 6. ESP rendering may affect performance; adjust rendering range as needed
Welcome.Tip7: 7. Recommended to use in single-player or private servers to avoid affecting other players
Welcome.DisclaimerText: This tool is for learning and research purposes only. Using this tool may violate game terms of service and may result in account ban. All consequences from using this tool are borne by the user; the author assumes no responsibility.
